name: War 2 Pixel IGI
description:
War 2 Pixel IGI is the best blocky army games, prepare your blocky squad in the fort of night to command and use modern war strike strategies against your enemy. You are the one of few surviving commanders after the world war and you are selected for the secret mission to defend your blocky army base from enemies.
Features:
- Amazing blocky army base environment
- Aim and shoot all blocky enemies in the unknown battlefields
- Experience multiple weapons including sniper gun, rifleman and grenadier
- Unique and exciting blocky environment for endless fun
- High quality graphics and astonishing sound effects.
